metadata.name: Wscript Shell Run In CommandLine
metadata.comment: Detects the presence of the keywords "Wscript", "Shell" and "Run" in the command, which could indicate a suspicious activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wscript.')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.shell')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.run')))

output.summary: Detects the presence of the keywords "Wscript", "Shell" and "Run" in the command, which could indicate a suspicious activity

metadata.objective: False positive: Inline scripting can be used by some rare third party applications or administrators. Investigate and apply additional filters accordingly References: https://web.archive.org/web/20220830122045/http://blog.talosintelligence.com/2022/08/modernloader-delivers-multiple-stealers.html, https://blog.talosintelligence.com/modernloader-delivers-multiple-stealers-cryptominers-and-rats/
